def_cn: 肚子(儿童用语或对儿童说话时用)
def_en: Your tummy is the part of the front of your body below your waist. Tummy is often used by children or by adults talking to children.

def_cn: 肚肚(儿语或对儿童说话时用)
def_en: You can use tummy to refer to the parts inside your body where food is digested. Tummy is often used by children or by adults talking to children.
